hero.heading: Building Bridges Through Dialogue
hero.description: Samadhan is your trusted platform for resolving conflicts with empathy, expertise, and cultural sensitivity.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe every conflict deserves a peaceful solution. Our mission is to simplify access to professional mediators, enable multilingual guidance through AI, and provide legal clarity to individuals and organizations across India.

whatWeDo.heading: What We Do
items: Connect users with certified mediators in various fields.
Offer AI chatbot support in multiple regional languages.
Provide downloadable legal documents and guides.
Host community forums for shared stories and support.
